resources.string: Are you sure you would like to sign out?
Are you sure you want to skip taking a picture of the client? Taking a picture is highly recommended.
The session token is no longer valid.
Please enter information into all fields that appear in red.
Take a picture of the client.
Current session info is displayed. To go back, press the back button on your device.
Scan a Clarity QR Code for the client\'s ticket.
The QR code you scanned was invalid. Ensure you are only using QR codes generated by the Clarity Console and try again.
Are these settings okay? To go back, press the back button on your device.
The session token is no longer valid.
The session token is no longer valid.
The server is experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later.
Â©2014 Akshay Sharma, Aditya Johri, Jonathan Ballands, Samuel Gillispie
You must sign in to use Clarity.
The username/password combination you entered was not recognized. Review your credentials and try again.
The ticket cannot be found. Ensure you are using a valid ticket and try again.
It seems that the ticket scanned was valid but had no patient associated with it. This may be a system error. Contact a supervisor to resolve this issue.
Unfortunately, an error has occurred. Please try again later.
Are you sure you would like to leave the creation process?
Are you sure you would like to leave the service assignment process? If you leave, your data will not be saved but the ticket will remain open.
It appears that your device isn\'t connected to the Internet. Connect your device to the Internet and try again.
It appears that your device isn\'t connected to the Internet. You will now be returned to the sign in screen.
The server is experiencing technical difficulties at this time. Please try again later.
Communication with the server took too long and was canceled. You may have a weak connection to the Internet or the cloud may be unavailable.
A stable connection with the server could not be established. Check that the router you are connected to is connected to the Internet and try again.
